TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeReturnReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter
Public MustInherit Class MimeReturnReader Inherits MimeFormatter

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端提供传入响应返回值读取器的通用基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for readers of incoming response return values for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务作者和读者序列化和反序列化，分别之间的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法和 HTTP 请求或响应流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务作者和读者使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类建立一种通用接口进行的 HTTP 响应流的 Web 方法的返回值的所有客户端读取。The class establishes a common interface for all client-side reading of HTTP response streams into Web method return values. 您通常不需要使用或直接其子代类。You typically will not need to use or its descendant classes directly. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现根据客户端代理代码，它适用每个 Web 方法和设置的特性属性设置为类，该类派生从。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the class, which is derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Read (System.Net.WebResponse response, System.IO.Stream responseStream);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Read(class System.Net.WebResponse response, class System.IO.Stream responseStream) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Read (response As WebResponse, responseStream As Stream) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ Read(System::Net::WebResponse ^ response, System::IO::Stream ^ responseStream);
abstract member Read : System.Net.WebResponse * System.IO.Stream -> obj

param.name: response
param.span: 一个包含操作的输出消息的 对象。

span.span: A object containing the output message for an operation.

param.name: responseStream
param.span: 一个 ，其内容是由 参数表示的 HTTP 响应的正文。

span.span: A whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the parameter.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，将 HTTP 响应反序列化为 Web 方法返回值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes an HTTP response into a Web method return value.

returns.span: 反序列化到 Web 方法的 HTTP 响应返回值。

span.span: An HTTP response deserialized into a Web method return value.
